name: Redford McAlester
Note: owns Casino of the Sun; is tribal chief of the OK Choctaws in 1990s

name: Jean Baptiste Le Moyne Sieur de Bienville
Note: helped found New Orleans and traded with Choctaws

name: Construction workers
Note: "tribe had awarded construction bids to Southeeastern Oklahoma's wisest good ol' boys" (139)

name: Choctaw of Louisiana
Note: Bienville traded with a number of Choctaw towns in Louisiana
